<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2863</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">American Visitors in the Area where you live.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amerikanische Besucher im Bereich, in dem Sie 
leben.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Visiteurs américains dans la zone où vous 
vivez.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visitantes americanos na área onde você vive.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ospiti americani nella zona dove vivete.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμερικανικοί επισκέπτες στην περιοχή όπου ζείτε.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Visitantes americanos en el área donde usted 
vive.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an activity where students collect relevant information and write a travel itinerary for their area.The students make a written and oral presentation of the itinerary to a group of American visitors. Includes assessment rubric and actual examples.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">itinerary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">travel assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Aktivität, in der 
Kursteilnehmer relevante Informationen sammeln und einen 
Spielraumreiseweg für ihre area.The Kursteilnehmer schreiben, bilden 
einer Gruppe amerikanischen Besuchern eine geschriebene und 
Munddarstellung vom Reiseweg. Schließt Einschätzung Rubrik und
tatsächliche Beispiele ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité où les étudiants 
rassemblent l'information appropriée et écrivent un itinéraire de 
voyage pour leurs étudiants d'area.The font une présentation écrite
et orale de l'itinéraire à un groupe de visiteurs américains. 
Inclut la rubrique d'évaluation et les exemples réels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade onde os 
estudantes coletem a informação relevante e escrevam um itinerary do
curso para seus estudantes de area.The faz uma apresentação escrita 
e oral do itinerary a um grupo de visitantes americanos. Inclui 
o rubric da avaliação e exemplos reais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività dove gli allievi 
raccolgono le informazioni relative e scrivono un itinerario di corsa 
per i loro allievi di area.The fa una presentazione scritta ed orale 
dell'itinerario ad un gruppo degli ospiti americani. Include la 
rubrica di valutazione e gli esempi reali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι 
σπουδαστές συλλέγουν τις σχετικές πληροφορίες και γράφουν μια 
περιήγηση ταξιδιού για την περιοχή τους Οι σπουδαστές 
παρουσιάζουν γραπτή και προφορική της περιήγησης σε μια ομάδα 
αμερικανικών επισκεπτών. Περιλαμβάνει τη ρουμπρίκα 
αξιολόγησης και τα πραγματικά παραδείγματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad donde los 
estudiantes recogen la información relevante y escriben un itinerario
del recorrido para sus estudiantes de area.The hace una presentación 
escrita y oral del itinerario a un grupo de visitantes americanos. 
Incluye la rúbrica del gravamen y ejemplos reales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reiseweg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielraumeinschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">itinéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation de voyage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">itinerary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">avaliação do curso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">itinerario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione di corsa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιήγηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αξιολόγηση του ταξιδιού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">itinerario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravamen del recorrido</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
